info: Rating, 5 stars,  · 1 week ago,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Host was very responsive and building staff was helpful. The place was spacious especially the dining, kitchen and living room. We stayed in room 3B and my suggestions would be to add a mattress topper for the bed because the bed is not comfortable, and the AC needs to be fixed since it makes quite a noticeable sound. The elevator in the building does not function so that is something to keep in mind, however the staff helped us with my luggage which was very kind of them :)

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · May 2024,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: The place is overall nice and worth staying if you want to live around center also not pay boatload of money. However, the place needs some attention on kitchen and furniture. Kitchen setup needs upgrading with proper cleaning. The refrigerator was not very clean and had a weird smell. Besides, the bedroom had strong smell of smoking which gave us terrible initial impression. Finally, Furnitures needed to be replaced with newer one. It is a big place either good proximity to almost everything, if it gets some upgrades it will be a great choice. And, the host is quick responsive and helpful.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
The host is extremely responsive when I tried to communicate and extremely accommodating of all my requests. He is a "superhost" for a reason.
I would say the location is not that private (I could hear honks deep into the night), especially coming from the US. Of course, I understand it is not his fault.
Overall, excellent host who tries above and beyond.
